message: Let's get this started! I'll take 80% of the initial amount. Will you accept?
I'll take 60% and leave 40% for you. Is that fair?
That's not enough for me. I'll make a counteroffer: 5500 for me and 4500 for you.
I'll take a slightly smaller share this time. Will you accept?
I'll take 70% and leave 30% for you. It's getting serious now!
Not yet! I'll make a counteroffer: 4200 for me and 5800 for you.
I'll take a bit more, but it's getting tough. Will you accept?
I'll take 80% and leave 20% for you. This is my final offer!
Alright, I'll take the 20%. It's better than nothing!
